titleStmt.title: Eliza Engle and Frances Vanhorn v. Sister Mary of the Sacred Heart. Memo from the Court Clerk Describing Testimony

bibl.title: Eliza Engle and Frances Vanhorn v. Sister Mary of the Sacred Heart. Memo from the Court Clerk Describing Testimony
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

person.persName: Sister Mary of the Sacred Heart

div1.p: Sister Mary Ignatious of the Sacred Heart Mother Superior of the House of the Good Shepherd for return to the within writ states that she has under her charge the said Frances Vanhorn. That said Frances Vanhorn is a minor and under the age of 17 and will be 18 years of age on 11 November next that said Frances Vanhorn was committed to said House of the Good Shephard by consent of her father who still lives. And in Obedience to the mandate of the within writ the body of said Frances Vanhorn is here brought into Court
Sister Mary of the Sacred Heart Superior
Sworn to and subscribed before me this 20th day of August
Testimony whereof I hereto set my and affix the seal of the St Louis Land Court at Office the date aforesaid
To Matron of House of the Good Shepherd
Proceeding before Hon J.C. Moodey at Chambers
Augt 25th 65 Demurrer sust. leave to amend Deft refusing to amend Girl discharged
